reporting.reportgraph.GraphQuery:
SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)28c209aa60e6a1a143893d9419fcabf0ff452c70b9b62b96b4543787ea9c58ef%}');
SELECT {%if (Columns == null) { "Date" } else { Columns }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)27f4f17d0170620c9916be715f405805aef74dfc712ba988a194599e7c8a72af%} AS StartTime , T1.Hits AS Time FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'{%if (Interval == null) { "year" } else { Interval }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)28c209aa60e6a1a143893d9419fcabf0ff452c70b9b62b96b4543787ea9c58ef%}') AS Dates LEFT JOIN (SELECT HitsStartTime AS StartTime, SUM(HitsValue) / SUM(HitsCount) AS hits FROM Analytics_Statistics INNER JOIN {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)b8ec447e0b995b5c0eda4d5f07606433a4a136d7487ee2fbf2be06ac769a7b77%} ON {%if (AnalyticsTable == null) { "Analytics_YearHits" } else { AnalyticsTable }|(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)b8ec447e0b995b5c0eda4d5f07606433a4a136d7487ee2fbf2be06ac769a7b77%}.HitsStatisticsID = Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID WHERE (StatisticsSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID) AND (StatisticsCode = 'avgtimeonpage') AND StatisticsObjectID = @NodeID AND StatisticsObjectCulture = @CultureCode GROUP BY HitsStartTime) AS T1 ON T1.StartTime = [Date]
